paper_abstract: The development of multistandard devices requires the realization of tunable functions such as filters and phase-shifters. This led us to fabricate stubs and interdigital capacitors with ferroelectric materials so as to use them as basic circuits in loaded structures for further investigations about their behavior at microwave frequencies. This study was aimed at assessing topologies to find the one the most able to take benefit of the agility provided by the ferroelectric material. (C) 2006 Wiley Periodicals, Inc.
paper_title: Ferroelectric-based agile devices - Application to tunable filters
